description: Standard severity levels for risks, issues, and findings

severity_levels.label: Critical
severity_levels.description: Immediate action required. Mission or delivery at risk.

severity_levels.label: Medium
severity_levels.description: Moderate impact. Should be addressed in normal workflow.

severity_levels.label: Low
severity_levels.description: Minor impact. Can be addressed when convenient.

severity_levels.label: Informational
severity_levels.description: For awareness only. No action required.
